item.description:

In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew give an important post-mortem on the 1 Million March 4 Children. THIS MUST ONLY BE THE BEGINNING!

Episode Resources: Hands Off Our Kids: https://handsoffourkids.ca/; 1 Million March 4 Children: https://millionmarch4children.squarespace.com/;

item.title: CORRUPT LABOUR UNIONS Stand Against Parents & Children, Stand with the Rainbow Mafia [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 19, 2023
In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew talk about the 1 Million March 4 Children, how corrupt public-sector unions use public money to mobilize thousands of radical Left-wing to stand AGAINST parents and other concerned tax-payers, and how the MSM lies and obfuscates to protect the REGIME and forward its Marxist ends.

[Segment 1] - Rapid Fire New Update:
"CBC Corporate Directors Earn Six-Figure Salaries" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/09/14/cbc-corporate-directors-six-figure-salaries;
"True North Denied Liberal Retreat" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/09/12/true-north-denied-liberal-retreat;
"Rebel News Win Over Environment Minister Steven Guilbeault Makes International Waves" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/rebel_news_win_over_environment_minister_steven_guilbeault_makes_international_waves;

[Segment 2] - MSM & LABOUR UNIONS STAND AGAINST PARENTS AND CHILDREN:
EMERGENCY LABOUR UNION ZOOM MEETING LEAK | Tweet by Odessa Orlewicz: https://twitter.com/odessaorlewicz/status/1703118857312125229;
CBC News Video | CBC: https://www.cbc.ca/player/play/2263228483954;
Hands Off Our Kids: https://handsoffourkids.ca/;
1 Million March 4 Children: https://millionmarch4children.squarespace.com/;

[Segment 3] - 1984 COMES TO A LIBRARY NEAR YOU:
"Peel School Board to Cull Equity Books" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/peel-school-board-equity-cull-books#Echobox=1694638125;
"Peel School Board Starts 'Library Book Weeding' Process" | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/peel-school-board-library-book-weeding-1.6964332.

item.title: LD SPECIAL: 1 MILLION MARCH 4 CHILDREN ft. Organizer, Kamel El-Cheikh [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 18, 2023
HANDS OFF OUR KIDS!!! In this LD Special, host Matthew Hallick is joined by 1 Million March 4 Children organizer Kamel El-Cheikh to talk about the upcoming nationwide march that has united Canadians of every sort against radical Leftist indoctrination and sexualization in Canada's public schools. 

Episode Resources: Hands Off Our Kids: https://handsoffourkids.ca/; 1 Million March 4 Children: https://millionmarch4children.squarespace.com/;

item.title: THEY ARE COMING FOR YOUR CHILDREN and the CONS Won't Stop Them ft. Josh Alexander [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 14, 2023
In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew are joined by Josh Alexander to discuss his upcoming events and recent legal victory. They also give a post-mortem of the CPC convention, the impotence of feckless Christ-less conservatism, and the Canadian government's continued push to centre the COVID crisis.

[Segment 1] - Interview ft. Josh Alexander:
Josh Alexander's Twitter: https://twitter.com/officialJosh_A;
Save Canada Linktree: https://linktr.ee/save_canada;
Court Document (Josh Alexander v. RCCDSB): https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Josh-Alexander-v-RCCDSB-2023-ONSC-4962-August-31-2023.pdf;

[Segment 2] - CPC PUTS THE "CON" IN CONSERVATIVE:
"Conservatives Push Back Against Woke Ideology at Quebec Convention" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/09/12/conservatives-push-back-against-woke-ideology-at-quebec-convention;
"Conservative Party of Canada Approves Slew of Pro-Family Policies at National Convention" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/conservative-party-of-canada-approves-slew-of-pro-family-policies-at-national-convention;
"Transgender Conservative Candidate Says Vote Against Gender-Affirming" | The Globe and Mail: https://www.theglobeandmail.com/canada/article-transgender-conservative-candidate-says-vote-against-gender-affirming;
YouTube Video Embed: https://www.youtube.com/embed/o5VOp1RC1O8;
"It's a Privilege, Not a Right, to Know Your Kid's Gender Identity" | The Star (Opinion): https://www.thestar.com/opinion/contributors/it-s-a-privilege-not-a-right-to-know-your-kid-s-gender-identity/article_b35628fa-5761-5087-b7a2-3db9dc49e2f2.html;

[Segment 3] - MORE COVID CRAZINESS:
"Health Canada Approves Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine Targeting Omicron Subvariant" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/updated-health-canada-approves-moderna-covid-19-vaccine-targeting-omicron-subvariant/article_28e66894-5194-11ee-9319-87a36267c6d3.html;
TheCounterSignal's Tweet: https://twitter.com/TheCounterSgnl/status/1701633206930534682;
TrueNorth Centre's Tweet: https://twitter.com/TrueNorthCentre/status/1701670160866705463;
Disclose.tv's Tweet: https://twitter.com/disclosetv/status/1701682459467788557.

item.title: Living Under Leviathan ft. Bruce Pardy: Against the Administrative State [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 12, 2023
In this episode, hosts Andrew and Matthew are joined by law professor Bruce Pardy to discuss his recent article with the Brownstone Institute, "The Anatomy of the Administrative State." What is it? How does it undermine principles of freedom and self-governance? Finally, how can we fight back against it? YOU'RE NOT GOING TO WANT TO MISS THIS ONE!

[Segment 1] - THE ANATOMY OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE STATE ft. Bruce Pardy:
Rights Probe Website: https://www.rightsprobe.org/;
"Anatomy of the Administrative State" | Brownstone Institute: https://brownstone.org/articles/anatomy-of-the-administrative-state/;

[Segment 2] - COVID CRISIS AND THE ADMINISTRATIVE STATE:
"B.C. Considers Restarting Mask Mandate in Hospitals: Health Minister" | CHEK News: https://www.cheknews.ca/b-c-considers-restarting-mask-mandate-in-hospitals-health-minister-1168143;
"Ottawa to Reintroduce Masking" | True North: https://tnc.news/2023/09/07/ottawa-reintroduce-masking;
"Lawyer Implores Hospital to Embrace Compassion Over Aggression as Mask Mandate Returns" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/lawyer_implores_hospital_to_embrace_compassion_over_aggression_as_mask_mandate_returns;
"A Biblical Theology of the Face: What Endless Mask-Wearing Does to the Image of God, the Gospel, and the Church" | DavidSchrock.com: https://davidschrock.com/2020/10/31/a-biblical-theology-of-the-face-what-endless-mask-wearing-does-to-the-image-of-god-the-gospel-and-the-church;

[Segment 3] - PERSECTUING ENEMIES OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE STATE:
"First Week of Trial of Freedom Convoy Organizers: Lich & Barber" | Western Standard News: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/first-week-of-trial-of-freedom-convoy-organizers-lich-barber/article_fd792dae-4e8c-11ee-ab4c-b785292a97ab.html;
"Tamara Lich and Chris Barber: Freedom Convoy Organizers - Day 3 Trial Recap" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/tamara_lich_and_chris_barber_freedom_convoy_organizers_day_3_trial_recap;
"Judge in High-Profile Trial of Tamara Lich Is Very Unhappy with Crown's Evidentiary Fumbling" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/judge_in_high_profile_trial_of_tamara_lich_is_very_unhappy_with_crown_s_evidentiary_fumbling;
